name: mcp-youtube-transcript
description: MCP server retrieving transcripts of YouTube videos

tools.name: get_transcript
tools.description: Fetches the transcript of a specified YouTube video.

tools.name: get_timed_transcript
tools.description: Fetches the transcript of a specified YouTube video with timestamps.

tools.name: get_video_info
tools.description: Fetches the metadata of a specified YouTube video.

response_limit.title: Maximum response character limit
response_limit.description: Maximum number of characters each response contains. Set a negative value to disable pagination.

webshare_proxy_username.title: Webshare proxy service username
webshare_proxy_username.description: Username for authentication with Webshare proxy service

webshare_proxy_password.title: Webshare proxy service password
webshare_proxy_password.description: Password for authentication with Webshare proxy service

http_proxy.title: HTTP proxy server URL
http_proxy.description: URL of an HTTP proxy server to use for requests (e.g. http://proxy.example.com:8080)

https_proxy.title: HTTPS proxy server URL
https_proxy.description: URL of an HTTPS proxy server to use for secure requests (e.g. https://proxy.example.com:8080)
